# gestureRecognizers

**Instance Property**

The gesture recognizers that are receiving the touch object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var gestureRecognizers: [UIGestureRecognizer]? { get }
```

## Discussion

The objects in the array are instances of a subclass of the abstract base class [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGestureRecognizer]. If there are no gesture recognizers currently receiving the touch, this property contains an empty array.
title: gestureRecognizers
